title: netwrck
author: netwrck
content: Netwrck is raising/created a token to help develop AIs.https://netwrck.com/netw-token NETW token will help the community build AGI, creators own their characters as NFTs, NETW will be spendable on AI Character chat or AI products/platforms:https://netwrck.com Social Chat Site with AI Charactershttps://text-generator.io AI APIs, including multi modal LLMs that understand code/text/images and generate speech.White Paper: https://static.netwrck.com/static/docs/NETW-White-Paper.pdfPurchase on uniswap link: https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?exactField=input&exactAmount=.5&inputCurrency=ETH&outputCurrency=0xe54fafe8c382e9d843d842c20ab61183dc2c7ed7100m total max supply 10m tokens selling at this stage.Will be Open Sourcing these products soon and work with the Open Source community to build more AI products with the help of the coin. Let me know what you think

comments.author: shell32
comments.body: Quote from: netwrck on June 22, 2023, 10:43:49 PMWill be Open Sourcing these products soon and work with the Open Source community to build more AI products with the help of the coin.As always, only wet fantasies and promises "soon", but "buy now" is already available and hurry up. These scammer projects are completely unimaginative.

comments.author: netwrck
comments.body: Quote from: shell32 on June 23, 2023, 12:52:27 AMQuote from: netwrck on June 22, 2023, 10:43:49 PMWill be Open Sourcing these products soon and work with the Open Source community to build more AI products with the help of the coin.As always, only wet fantasies and promises "soon", but "buy now" is already available and hurry up. These scammer projects are completely unimaginative.These are both legitimate sites with thousands of usershttps://text-generator.iohttps://netwrck.comIts working software that people find useful and is growing. It's definatly speculation with the coin but this is a real working thing not a scam. Dig in and find out if you like the projects, if you believe in them then the coin can be a good thing.People thought ethereum was a scam... Its just about picking the right projects really. Make sure theres a working product/tokenomics i think. Not something that is easy to build (like a landing page/marketing is not a product at all).
